# !!! WARNING !!! AUTO-GENERATED FILE, PLEASE DO NOT MODIFY IT AND USE
# https://docs.platformio.org/page/projectconf/section_env_build.html#build-flags

# If you need to override existing CMake configuration or add extra,
# please create `CMakeListsUser.txt` in the root of project.
# The `CMakeListsUser.txt` will not be overwritten by PlatformIO.



set(CMAKE_CONFIGURATION_TYPES "pico" CACHE STRING "Build Types reflect PlatformIO Environments" FORCE)

# Convert "Home Directory" that may contain unescaped backslashes on Windows
file(TO_CMAKE_PATH $ENV{HOMEDRIVE}$ENV{HOMEPATH} ENV_HOME_PATH)

set(CLION_SVD_FILE_PATH "${ENV_HOME_PATH}/.platformio/platforms/raspberrypi@src-ff76a3915224135aafad379817f41edd/misc/svd/rp2040.svd" CACHE FILEPATH "Peripheral Registers Definitions File" FORCE)

SET(CMAKE_C_COMPILER "${ENV_HOME_PATH}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-rp2040-earlephilhower/bin/arm-none-eabi-gcc.exe")
SET(CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER "${ENV_HOME_PATH}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-rp2040-earlephilhower/bin/arm-none-eabi-g++.exe")
SET(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "-fno-exceptions -fno-rtti -std=gnu++17 -Os -Os -Werror=return-type -march=armv6-m -mcpu=cortex-m0plus -mthumb -ffunction-sections -fdata-sections -iprefix${ENV_HOME_PATH}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinopico @${ENV_HOME_PATH}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinopico/lib/platform_inc.txt")
SET(CMAKE_C_FLAGS "-std=gnu17 -Os -Os -Werror=return-type -march=armv6-m -mcpu=cortex-m0plus -mthumb -ffunction-sections -fdata-sections -iprefix${ENV_HOME_PATH}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinopico @${ENV_HOME_PATH}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinopico/lib/platform_inc.txt")

SET(CMAKE_C_STANDARD 17)
set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD 17)

if (CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE MATCHES "pico")
    add_definitions(-DPLATFORMIO=60107)
    add_definitions(-DARDUINO_RASPBERRY_PI_PICO)
    add_definitions(-DARDUINO_ARCH_RP2040)
    add_definitions(-DUSBD_MAX_POWER_MA=500)
    add_definitions(-DCORE_DEBUG_LEVEL=ARDUHAL_LOG_LEVEL_DEBUG)
    add_definitions(-DUSER_SETUP_LOADED=1)
    add_definitions(-DILI9341_DRIVER=1)
    add_definitions(-DTFT_MISO=16)
    add_definitions(-DTFT_MOSI=19)
    add_definitions(-DTFT_SCLK=18)
    add_definitions(-DTFT_CS=20)
    add_definitions(-DTFT_DC=21)
    add_definitions(-DTFT_RST=22)
    add_definitions(-DLOAD_GLCD=1)
    add_definitions(-DLOAD_FONT2=1)
    add_definitions(-DLOAD_FONT4=1)
    add_definitions(-DLOAD_FONT6=1)
    add_definitions(-DLOAD_FONT7=1)
    add_definitions(-DLOAD_FONT8=1)
    add_definitions(-DLOAD_GFXFF=1)
    add_definitions(-DSMOOTH_FONT=1)
    add_definitions(-DSPI_FREQUENCY=70000000)
    add_definitions(-DSPI_READ_FREQUENCY=20000000)
    add_definitions(-DARDUINO=10810)
    add_definitions(-DARDUINO_ARCH_RP2040)
    add_definitions(-DF_CPU=133000000L)
    add_definitions(-DBOARD_NAME=\"pico\")
    add_definitions(-DARM_MATH_CM0_FAMILY)
    add_definitions(-DARM_MATH_CM0_PLUS)
    add_definitions(-DCFG_TUSB_MCU=OPT_MCU_RP2040)
    add_definitions(-DUSB_VID=0x2e8a)
    add_definitions(-DUSB_PID=0x000a)
    add_definitions(-DUSB_MANUFACTURER=\"Raspberry\ Pi\")
    add_definitions(-DUSB_PRODUCT=\"Pico\")
    add_definitions(-DSERIALUSB_PID=0x000a)
    add_definitions(-DPICO_CYW43_ARCH_THREADSAFE_BACKGROUND=1)
    add_definitions(-DCYW43_LWIP=1)
    add_definitions(-DLWIP_IPV4=1)
    add_definitions(-DLWIP_IGMP=1)
    add_definitions(-DLWIP_CHECKSUM_CTRL_PER_NETIF=1)
    add_definitions(-DLWIP_IPV6=0)
    add_definitions(-DARDUINO_VARIANT=\"rpipico\")

    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/include")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/pico/PNGdec/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/pico/TMC5160/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/pico/ArxTypeTraits")

    include_directories("${ENV_HOME_PATH}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduinopico/libraries/SPI/src")

    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/pico/SimpleCollections/src")

        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/pico/*.*

FILE(GLOB_RECURSE SRC_LIST
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/src/*.*
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/*.*
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/test/*.*
)

list(APPEND SRC_LIST ${EXTRA_LIB_SOURCES})
